DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Use Novel Cell Collector Device Retrieve Cells From Uterine Cervix
DOC.detailed_description: This study test feasibility , safety efficacy new e2TM Collector , compare performance standard method obtain cervical cell Pap test endocervical cytobrush Ayer 's Spatula
DOC.criteria: Women age > 14 follow previous abnormal Pap All patient sign Informed Consent form prior enrol study Patients hysterectomy
